lead_paragraph: Solitary Adaline has been 29-years-old for almost eight decades, but when she falls for a man, his parents threaten to uncover her secret, forcing her to make a life-changing decision.
snippet: Solitary Adaline has been 29-years-old for almost eight decades, but when she falls for a man, his parents threaten to uncover her secret, forcing her to make a life-changing decision.
